name: Nidoran♂
flavorText:
Stiffens its ears
to sense danger.
The larger its horns, the more
powerful its
secreted venom.

previous.name: Nidoqueen
previous.flavorText:
Its hard scales
provide strong
protection. It uses its hefty
bulk to execute
powerful moves.

next.name: Nidorino
next.flavorText:
An aggressive
POKéMON that is
quick to attack. The horn on its
head secretes a
powerful venom.

pokemon.name: Nidoking
pokemon.flavorText:
It uses its
powerful tail in
battle to smash, constrict, then
break the prey's
bones.
